column2: A vaccine to prevent the human papillomavirus or HPV infection is available and is called the cervical cancer or genital warts vaccine, HPV shot [Fill: if female “GARDASIL or CERVARIX”; if male “ or GARDASIL”]. Have you EVER had an HPV vaccination?
column19: 3 = Doctor refused when asked (skip to end)

column2: How many HPV shots did you receive?
